title: Heating Up at Prairie Fire
description:
Things are Heating Up at Prairie Fire Outdoor Patio
Bar Hours: Tuesday through Saturday 5pm - 11pm

Every Night is Game Night!
Bring your friends and get competitive with giant yard games!

Tune in Every Thursday!
Live acoustic performances 7:30pm -10pm

Yappy Hour on the Rooftop!
Every first Friday of the month from 6pm -9pm! 20% of the night's proceeds benefit Marley's Mutts dog rescue.

Relax With a Drink in Hand!
Choose from a menu of refreshing cocktails, frozen drinks, carafes of sangria, and buckets of craft beers

banner_image.alt: Prairie Fire Rooftop Specials at the Padre Hotel
